Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-22
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-22. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-22, affected by CVE-2024-51744
